page.title: 12EVENTS
page.content: The largest event in Stanhoe is Open Gardens Sunday which brings people into the village from afar and has become an annual one. Six gardens are open with various attractions, stalls of all kinds, games, raffles; the result usually amounting to about Â£1000, the whole sum given to the Parish Church restoration fund. Hospital Sunday, an event once common to every village in the county is held now only in Stanhoe, outdoors. Led by a Salvation Army Band hymns and prayers are offered by Ministers from both churches, the collection being devoted to amenities for patients in hospital. Other smaller events, sports on the playing field, coffee mornings, collections, special efforts for major repairs to the churches, Ethiopia, cancer, old folk's gifts etc
